item.title: PGN (Portable Game Notation) Parser
item.description:
This parser supports the PGN format based on : https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portable_Game_Notation

The movetext is based on SAN (Standard Algebraic Notation) Disambiguation is supported by checking VerifyIfKingBeingCheck before accepting a move PGN file format error detection Output format: The state of the board at the end of the game, in the form of an 8x8 grid.
